snippet: KAYE--Judith, was the most extraordinary combination of brilliance, dignity, warmth, humanity, elegance, integrity, sweetness, eloquence, wisdom, grace, compassion and inner and outer beauty of anyone I have ever known. I will miss her forever. Clare Hogenauer 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAYE--Judith, was the most extraordinary combination of brilliance, dignity, warmth, humanity, elegance, integrity, sweetness, eloquence, wisdom, grace, compassion and inner and outer beauty of anyone I have ever known. I will miss her forever. Clare Hogenauer 1/3
